```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
```

Assessment modes:

- `code`: generate exercises and solutions.
- `mcq`: generate MCQ blocks only.
- `both`: generate code exercises and MCQ blocks.

```{r eval=FALSE}
tutorize("tp.qmd", assessment = "code")
tutorize("tp.qmd", assessment = "mcq")
tutorize("tp.qmd", assessment = "both")
```
